DOC.brief_summary: The purpose of this study is to evaluate whether selenium and/or vitamin E are effective in preventing non-melanoma skin cancers.
DOC.brief_title: Bangladesh Vitamin E and Selenium Trial
DOC.criteria: Manifest arsenic skin lesions (melanosis, leucomelanosis, or keratosis) Aged 25 to 65 years Permanent resident of study area Pregnancy Clinically too ill (enlarged spleen or liver) Presence of gangrene Cancer
